series_title: Abandoned and Orphaned Mine Land Inventory
series_description: This series documents the location and status of abandoned and orphaned mines. This series may include, but is not to: inventories.

series_title: Abandoned and Orphaned Mine Land Real Estate Files
series_description: This series documents the owners of land affected by abandoned and orphaned mine land reclamation projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: county tax maps, indices, consents to enter, copies of deeds, liens, lien/ -no lien determinations, lien waivers or notices, fee appraisals, and other supporting documentation.
This series documents bond forfeitures resulting from an failure to comply with reclamation laws. This series may but is not limited to: lists

This series documents the issuance of Civil Penalty Determinations and Notices of Violation and Cessation Orders where fines have not been issued or have been paid after issuance. This series may include., but is not limited to: determinations, final orders, liens, reviews

This series documents the submission of notices and applications for coal exploration and subsequent inspections of the mined land. This series may include, but is not limited to: notices, applications, and inspector reports

This series documents the monitoring of coal removal from government financed highway or construction sites that are exempt from reclamation rules. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and project documentation. -130-707

This series documents routine actions and activities of the enforcement staff such as site visits. This series may include, but is not limited to: inspector frequency sheets, reports, oversight records, grant materials, logs, inspector monthly diaries, and correspondence
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents activities associated with mining and reclamation such as surface water hydrology, geologic, engineering, ecology, agronomy, land use and water supply inventory. This series may include but is not limited to: maps
This series documents the history of closed mines. This series may include, but is not limited to: final inspection reports and completion maps.
This series documents mining permit applications packets that have not been approved. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications and correspondence
This series documents the issuance of mining permits. This series may include, but is not limited to: permits, enforcement complaints, and permit inspection and violation reports

series_title: National Pollution Discharge Elimination System (NPDES): Monitoring and Compliance
series_description: This series documents permittee reporting of National Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) discharges and water monitoring, and compliance tracking by the agency of coal mining dischargers. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports
This series documents an index of mining permits that have been issued and activities of each permit such as renewals revisions. This series may include, but is not limited to: Indices and ledgers.

This series documents receipt of a Ten Day Notice of violation from the Federal Office of Surface Mining (OSM) and subsequent department actions in response to the notice. This series may include, but is not limited to: Notices of Violation
This series documents sampling and testing of water quality to determine a permittee's compliance with standards. This may include but is not limited to: reports
